mapper.select: SELECT C.ID ,C.NAME ,C.PASSENGERS ,D.ID AS D_ID ,D.NAME AS D_NAME FROM CARS AS C INNER JOIN DRIVERS AS D ON D.CARS_ID = C.ID WHERE C.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cars (id, name, passengers) VALUES (nextval('car_id_seq'), #{name}, #{passengers})
mapper.update: UPDATE cars SET name = #{name}, passengers = #{passengers} WHERE id = #{id}
